1001090.name: Eurobi Racing: Donationware
1001090.description: This DLC does not give you anything. This is a donation, and 100% of the money will be put back into this game, or into the other projects I am working on. I do not believe in IAP's for skins, extra tracks, "play time" and other such petty things. This is why my game is a one-time purchase and why I have this "DLC". I will be working to make this game have more variety. Specifically; more vehicles, environments, more events during gameplay, and more supported platforms including mobile. From there, profits will be put towards new games I hope you will all look forward to. Thank you all for your support, thank you!
1001090.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
